com.echonest.api.v4.util

Class Shell

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.echonest.api.v4.util.Shell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Shell
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class is a command interpreter. It reads strings from an input stream, parses them into commands and executes them, results are sent back on the output stream. TODO: this was written before there were generics, it should be upgraded to use them.
    See Also:
    Shell
